channel.title: marcin-chwedczuk.github.io/
channel.description: A place where I share my thoughts about programming.

item.title: Obfuscating windows batch files using undefined environmental variables
item.description: In this post I will present an old trick from mid 90s used by hackers to obfuscate code stored in Windows .bat files. The trick is simple and works on all versions of Windows up to Windows 10.
